user.biography: Founder of @konmari.co. Author of “The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up.” Star of @netflix's "Tidying Up With Marie Kondo.”

node.text: Is tidying your dream job? Become a certified KonMari Consultant to help people tidy their homes using the KonMari Method! Dates for our next Virtual Consultant Certification Courses have been announced. Visit konmari.is/3hsjqKt to learn more.

node.text: Master Marie Kondo’s signature KonMari fold! Learn how to fold menswear, including ties, briefs, button-down shirts, pants and thin sweaters.

node.text: Master Marie Kondo’s signature KonMari fold! Learn how to fold your basic clothing items, including tank tops, t-shirts, long-sleeved t-shirts, thin sweaters, pants and shorts.

node.text: https://www.instagram.com/tv/BqNl0wHB-Pi/?utm_source=ig_share_sheet&igshid=13usu84rg2kv1

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 29, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing and indoor.

node.text: If you think that tidying up just means getting rid of clutter, it’s simply not true. Always keep in mind that the true purpose is to find and keep the things you truly love, to display these proudly in your home and to live a joyful life. ✨

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 21, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, outdoors and text that says 'ANETFLIX SERIES SPARKING JOY WITH MARIE KONDO THE HOME WAS JUST THE BEGINNING AUG31 AUG 31 NETFLIX'.

node.text:
When I reflect on how much has changed for me in the last few years, I always feel especially moved by the way so many of you welcomed the KonMari philosophy into your homes after seeing my first show. 
 
I know the KonMari community has been eagerly awaiting my return to @netflix. I’m overjoyed to say it’s almost here — and this time, we’re going beyond tidying at home! My new series, “Sparking Joy,” premieres on August 31, only on Netflix. ✨

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 18, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and indoor.

node.text: With three young kids and busy schedules, eating as a family can be challenging – but it’s always rewarding. Before eating, we set an intention to enjoy the meal and express gratitude for the person who prepared it – and for the food itself. Visit the link in my bio for more of my cooking tips!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 12, 2021. May be an image of indoor and text that says 'TIDY HACK POPCORN'.

node.text: In Japanese "ori" means to weave. If you want to use storage baskets – in places such as the pantry or closet, for example – then it’s best to choose ones with strong materials whose beauty also brings you joy. Gorgeous pantry, @settled.home!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 08, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, bottle, indoor and text that says 'concentrah con concent entral Cleaning All-purpose cleaner.'.

node.text: Cleaning is a form of self-care 🧽 Cleaning with clean ingredients is even better. @Soapply is the real deal –– made from plant-based and honest-to-goodness ingredients. Best yet, they donate proceeds to support clean water, sanitation, and hygiene projects around the world.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 05, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text: Organize the world. I am overjoyed to announce our new online community, @konmariconsultants. Whether you’re searching for a career change or hoping to make a positive change in people’s lives through tidying, look no further! Learn how to join our esteemed group of certified KonMari Consultants at the link in my bio. Photo by @myhappyhomezurich. ✨

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on July 02, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text: “Hikidashi” in Japanese means “a drawer,” or a place to organize your treasured possessions. After years of searching for the right kind I created a line of my own. Visit the link in my bio to learn more!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on June 22, 2021. May be an image of flower and indoor.

node.text: The easiest way to add a touch of joy to any decluttered space is to add flowers! Which blooms have made an appearance in your home recently? Photo by certified KonMari Consultant, @nancyeatoninspiredliving.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Marie Kondo on June 20, 2021 tagging @takumi.kwhr. May be an image of baby and indoor.

node.text: Describe parenting in three words: "Love, love and love." Happy Father's Day, @takumi.kwhr!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on June 09, 2021. May be an image of book and indoor.

node.text:
Just like how we experience joy, the way each person best learns will differ. If flipping through pages is your preference, add these to your summer reading list! 

For those who like to see and hear it in action, @konmari.co’s digital tidying course might be a better fit (currently on sale on our site through the month of June!). Photo by Consultant-In-Training @letsbewildflowers!

dash_info.video_dash_manifest:
<MPD xmlns="urn:mpeg:dash:schema:mpd:2011" minBufferTime="PT1.500S" type="static" mediaPresentationDuration="PT0H0M5.000S" maxSegmentDuration="PT0H0M3.000S" profiles="urn:mpeg:dash:profile:isoff-on-demand:2011,http://dashif.org/guidelines/dash264">
 <Period duration="PT0H0M5.000S">

node.text: When you welcome plants or sunlight into your home, the space lives, breathes and changes over time. This means you can appreciate each of the different ways it looks at any given moment – it might never look the same way twice! For help with adding plants to your indoor space, visit the link in my bio. Such an inspiring interior, @caropeony!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Marie Kondo on May 31, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text: To transform your pantry in a way that inspires more frequent cooking, store goods upright and group them by subcategory. For more on tackling the pantry, head to the link in my bio. @simplyorganizedco, I love what you’ve done with the place – especially those @thecontainerstore x @konmari.co rattan bins! 😉 Photo by @desireekeoshianphoto.
